articles.title: Exclusive: First video emerges of US-UK strikes on Houthi targets in Yemen - Times of India
articles.description: The official account of U.S. Central Command (CENTCOM) shared a video on X showcasing the joint military strikes carried out by U.S. and UK forces. These operations, supported by Australia, Canada, the Netherlands, and Bahrain, were conducted at 2:30
